# tobii2pix { #DeToX.tobii2pix }

```python
tobii2pix(win, p)
```

Convert Tobii ADCS coordinates to PsychoPy pixel coordinates.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                   | Description                                                          | Default    |
|--------|------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| win    | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size. | _required_ |
| p      | tuple                  | The Tobii ADCS coordinates to convert.                               | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                               |
|--------|--------|-------------------------------------------|
|        | tuple  | The converted PsychoPy pixel coordinates. |

## Notes {.doc-section .doc-section-notes}

The conversion is done by multiplying the ADCS coordinates by the window
size and subtracting 0.5 from the x and y coordinates to move the origin
to the top-left corner of the screen.
